701023f-a.text:
Exterior Street, between West 230th Street and West Kingsbridge Road. The view is in a southwesterly direction, showing W.P.A. men working on a sewer project. Im the center background is visible the Webb Academy;on the extreme right is the Hall of Fame of New York University,and in the left background is the .S. 'eterans Hospital.
April 27, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
